Title: Margaret - 33726 Area Rug
Body (HTML):

  • Margaret collection area rugs are machine woven with a 100% polyester rug pile, with its fibers cropped short for easy family-friendly cleanup. Both ends are capped in a subtle fringe for an artisanal look.
  • Blot spills immediately using a dry white cloth or a clean sponge. Vacuum using a suction-only setting, taking care to avoid vacuuming over the fringes.

Antique elegance meets smart modern practicality with the go-anywhere Elle collection from Becki Owens x Surya. The exciting Elle 32369 area rug draws from old-world influences, its classic patterns rendered in light palettes for uplifting appeal. Resilient construction allows for true family-friendly functionality even in high-traffic rooms.

  • Becki Owens is an interior designer and influencer based out of Southern California. Her signature style is both highly curated yet approachable, her love for vintage elements perfectly reflected in this rug collection.
  • This traditional area rug features an oversized central medallion flanked by geometric spandrels and whimsical botanical elements. A light distressed effect lends a timeworn appearance that looks comfortably lived-in.
  • Elle is a collection that has been machine woven with a flat surface for easy cleanup and care. The pattern has been printed directly atop the surface in high resolution. Serged edges resist fraying for lasting performance.
  • Blot spills immediately using a dry white cloth or a clean sponge. Vacuum using a suction-only setting as needed.

Title: Luca - 32372 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
The beautiful Luca 23272 area rug offers old-world charm with all the advantages of modern materials. Designed by Becki Owens in collaboration with Surya, this piece draws inspiration from vintage influences – reimagined in smart modern synthetics that can keep up with the most active family homes. Enjoy all the elegance of an authentic antique without the complex upkeep requirements.

  • The Luca Collection is crafted into a low-profile polyester base that has been directly printed with the vintage design.Interior designer Becki Owens has teamed up with innovative rug manufacturer Surya to create a series of antique-inspired area rugs that she would use within her own projects, each one wonderfully accessible for go-anywhere appeal.
  • Luca 23272 features a classic medallion and border design inspired by traditional area rug motifs. Cool-hued coloration makes this piece wonderfully refreshing, perfect for uplifting interior themes like cottage and contemporary boho chic.
  • Machine-woven construction lends dependable consistency and quality to this inventive collection. Luca collection rugs are woven from 100% polyester for resistance against staining, fading, and wear. Feel confident using in higher-traffic placements.
  • Quickly blot away spills using a dry white cloth or a clean sponge. Always remember to disengage the vacuum beater bar component before vacuuming.

The beautiful Luca 23272 area rug offers old-world charm with all the advantages of modern materials. Designed by Becki Owens in collaboration with Surya, this piece draws inspiration from vintage influences – reimagined in smart modern synthetics that can keep up with the most active family homes. Enjoy all the elegance of an authentic antique without the complex upkeep requirements.

  • The Luca Collection is crafted into a low-profile polyester base that has been directly printed with the vintage design.Interior designer Becki Owens has teamed up with innovative rug manufacturer Surya to create a series of antique-inspired area rugs that she would use within her own projects, each one wonderfully accessible for go-anywhere appeal.
  • Luca 23272 features a classic medallion and border design inspired by traditional area rug motifs. Cool-hued coloration makes this piece wonderfully refreshing, perfect for uplifting interior themes like cottage and contemporary boho chic.
  • Machine-woven construction lends dependable consistency and quality to this inventive collection. Luca collection rugs are woven from 100% polyester for resistance against staining, fading, and wear. Feel confident using in higher-traffic placements.
  • Quickly blot away spills using a dry white cloth or a clean sponge. Always remember to disengage the vacuum beater bar component before vacuuming.

Title: Lila - 32499 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
True classics are a flattering complement for any interior decor theme. The beautiful Lila 32499 area rug by Becki Owens x Surya draws inspiration from old-world heirlooms, upgraded with smart modern materials for excellent family-friendly performance – even in active placements like dining rooms, living rooms, entryways, and more.

  • The Lila Collection is crafted into a low-profile polyester base that has been directly printed with the vintage design.
  • Interior designer Becki Owens often uses antique area rugs within her projects, and the Lila collection continues this theme so that anyone can emulate this facet of her warm and welcoming decor style.
  • Lila 32499 features a classic central medallion motif surrounded by an open field with edges trimmed in layered botanical borders. Distressed coloration gives this traditional rug a charming vintage look.
  • Each area rug in the Lila collection is machine woven. This is a 100% polyester area rug, offering excellent resistance against staining and wear for long-lasting style. Low-profile construction allows for placement near doors.
  • Blot spills immediately using a dry white cloth or a clean sponge. Vacuum using a suction-only setting as needed. Rotate annually.
